name: Buddy Ultra Smash - (GMTK Game Jam 2022)
description:
Buddy Ultra Smash is a game where you fight an endless onslaught of random bosses with different types of attacks. Even Buddy joins in on the randomness by changing his look to a random one every time you play again. After defeating a boss you will get a random buff, however, the bosses get more challenging the more you beat them so be warned.

How To Play:

Use the left and right arrow keys to move or used "a" and "d" to move, you can change between the two by clicking the controls button in the start menu. Use the mouse to aim and shoot the bosses.

WARNING! When the boss or player gets hit they flash white really quick so if you have problems with this be careful or don't play.
